main event: A UFO was observed in Dayton, Ohio on August 6, 1956, displaying variable motion without making noise.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7-8 minutes and involved one object that darted back and forth, No noise was reported during the observation, The object was reported while an air search mission was ongoing at night over Dayton, Several calls were made to report the sighting, Capt. Gregory checked later and positively identified the object as planet Venus.
sighted object: noisy flying object darting back and forth
witness description: A civilian observer who was outdoors at the time of the sighting.
